Powers.DescLong: Jack can summon a Ice Sword that deals above average damage and can Slow foes' attack speed.
While active, you dramatically lower the temperature around yourself, Slowing the attack rate of all nearby foes, as well as their movement speed. Recharge: Very Fast

This Freezing Touch will encase a single foe in a block of ice. This will deal high damage over time, as well as freezing them in their tracks, leaving them cold and helpless. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Summons a more powerful and deadly Ice Sword. Like Ice Sword, Greater Ice Sword can slow your foes' attack speed.
Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; their chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Jack takes little damage from Cold attacks. Jack is also resistant to Sleep and Disorient.
